EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Accenture
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "Sir or Madam")},
Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca.
I received notification that you recently registered for one of our webinars. Can I answer any questions for you about Tricentis or Tosca? As a note, Tricentis is a strategic Accenture partner with joint customers in all 3 regions with several new joint customers expected in the next 60 days. Accenture also has a Tosca CoE and over 350 trained and certified Tosca consultants.
Also, here are a few links for more information about Tosca:
Download fact sheets, case studies and whitepapers from our webpage at http://www.tricentis.com/resources/ Take our free online training at https://www.udemy.com/get-in-touch-with-tricentis-tosca-testsuite/ Submit for and download our trial license at http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/tosca-testsuite-trial/
Best regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
Tricentis m - {!User.MobilePhone} e - {!User.Email}
Tricentis GmbH Company Headquarters: Saturn Tower, Leonard-Bernstein-Stra√üe 10, 1220 Vienna FN 213896d Handelsgericht Wien
Tricentis US Headquarters, 5150 El Camino Real, Suite D14, Los Altos, CA 94022
